name: Higher Ground
Lore: 'Using his position to his advantage, Luke managed to hold off Vader''s onslaught, if only for a few seconds.',
Text: 'USED: During a battle at a site, instead of firing one of your character weapons at a target, cause that target to be power -4 until end of turn.LOST: During a battle at a site, use 3 Force to cancel one battle destiny just drawn.',
